meanings.definition: A prefix meaning one or single.
meanings.sent1: I only have one apple, it's a uni.
meanings.sent2: She lives in a small uni house.
meanings.sent3: The uni little bird sang a solo.
meanings.sent4: The uni flower stood out among the rest.
meanings.sent5: The uni star shone brightly in the night sky.

meanings.sent1: He studied at a prestigious uni.
meanings.sent2: The uni offers a variety of courses.
meanings.sent3: The uni students had a fun party.
meanings.sent4: The uni campus was bustling with activity.
meanings.sent5: She dreamed of attending a top uni one day.

meanings.definition: A type of seafood, short for sea urchin.
meanings.sent1: She tried uni sushi for the first time.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served fresh uni dishes.
meanings.sent3: The uni in the dish looked like a tiny hedgehog.
meanings.sent4: The uni added a unique flavor to the meal.
meanings.sent5: He savored the creamy texture of the uni.
